question.body: The smooth muscle cells of the cardiovascular system __________.

multiple_choice.choice: transmit signals about the local chemical environment

response.feedback: Incorrect. The endothelial cells of blood vessels participate in immune function, not the smooth muscle.
Incorrect. The endothelial cells transmit signals about the local chemical environment to the smooth muscles.
Correct. The smooth muscle cells add strength to blood vessels and allow for blood vessel adaptation (constriction and dilation).
Incorrect. Damage to the endothelial cells promotes blood clotting.
